title: Squared CJK Unified Ideograph-7981

description:
This Emoji means “prohibit, restrict or forbid” in Japanese.

CJK Ideographs are characters used in Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages. Their writing systems all completely or partly use Chinese characters.
apple_vendor_description: The Japanese prohibited button emoji, as seen on Apple devices, presents a bold, circular red sign with a thick white border. Inside, a stylized white horizontal bar is overlaid on a vertical bar, creating a stark, universally understood symbol of prohibition or a "no" instruction. This emoji's clean lines and precise 3D shading on Apple devices convey a clear and unambiguous message of restriction or what is not allowed.
